verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G2980"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, the \w priests|strong="G2409"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w captain|strong="G4755"\w* of the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w*, came \w upon|strong="G2186"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*,

Being \w grieved|strong="G1278"\w* \w that|strong="G1223"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w preached|strong="G2605"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* the \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w laid|strong="G1911"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* on \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G5087"\w* \add them\add* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w hold|strong="G5084"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the next \w day|strong="G0839"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* \w eventide|strong="G2073"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="G1161"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* of them which \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of the \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w about|strong="G5616"\w* \w five|strong="G4002"\w* \w thousand|strong="G5505"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w morrow|strong="G0839"\w*, \w that|strong="G4863"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Annas|strong="G0452"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Caiaphas|strong="G2533"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Alexander|strong="G0223"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w kindred|strong="G1085"\w* of the high \w priest|strong="G0748"\w*, were gathered together \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2476"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* had \w set|strong="G2476"\w* them \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w*, they \w asked|strong="G4441"\w*, \w By|strong="G1722"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*, \w have|strong="G4160"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*?

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* with \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, Ye \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w* of the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*,

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* this \w day|strong="G4594"\w* be \w examined|strong="G0350"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* the good deed \w done|strong="G2108"\w* \w to|strong="G0444"\w* the \w impotent|strong="G0772"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* what \w means|strong="G5101"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* is made \w whole|strong="G4982"\w*;

Be \w it|strong="G2077"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \add even\add* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* him \w doth|strong="G3936"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* stand \w here|strong="G3936"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w whole|strong="G5199"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was set at \w nought|strong="G1848"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w builders|strong="G3618"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w become|strong="G1096"\w* the \w head|strong="G2776"\w* of the \w corner|strong="G1137"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="G3777"\w* is \w there|strong="G2076"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* any \w other|strong="G0243"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w whereby|strong="G1722"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

¶ \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* when they \w saw|strong="G2334"\w* the \w boldness|strong="G3954"\w* of \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w perceived|strong="G2638"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w were|strong="G1526"\w* \w unlearned|strong="G0062"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ignorant|strong="G2399"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, they \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w* they took \w knowledge|strong="G1921"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they had \w been|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w beholding|strong="G0991"\w* the \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w could|strong="G2192"\w* \w say|strong="G0471"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* against \w it|strong="G0471"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* when they had \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* to go \w aside|strong="G0565"\w* out \w of|strong="G1854"\w* the \w council|strong="G4892"\w*, they \w conferred|strong="G4820"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0240"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* shall we \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w to|strong="G0444"\w* \w these|strong="G5125"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* a \w notable|strong="G1110"\w* \w miracle|strong="G4592"\w* hath been \w done|strong="G1096"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \add is\add* \w manifest|strong="G5318"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w them|strong="G2730"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w deny|strong="G0720"\w* \add it\add*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* it \w spread|strong="G1268"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w further|strong="G4119"\w* \w among|strong="G1519"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, let \w us|strong="G0546"\w* \w straitly|strong="G0547"\w* \w threaten|strong="G0546"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, that they \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w henceforth|strong="G3371"\w* to \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w commanded|strong="G3853"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w speak|strong="G5350"\w* at \w all|strong="G2527"\w* \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Whether|strong="G1487"\w* it \w be|strong="G2076"\w* \w right|strong="G1342"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* to \w hearken|strong="G0191"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, judge \w ye|strong="G2919"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* the things \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we have \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*.

\w So|strong="G1161"\w* when they had further \w threatened|strong="G4324"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, they let them \w go|strong="G0630"\w*, \w finding|strong="G2147"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* they might \w punish|strong="G2849"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, because \w of|strong="G3754"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*: \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add* \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* which was \w done|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w above|strong="G4119"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* years \w old|strong="G2094"\w*, \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w miracle|strong="G4592"\w* of \w healing|strong="G2392"\w* was \w shewed|strong="G1096"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* being let \w go|strong="G0630"\w*, they \w went|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* their own \w company|strong="G2398"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w reported|strong="G0518"\w* all \w that|strong="G3745"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* had \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w*, they lifted \w up|strong="G0142"\w* their \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* with one \w accord|strong="G3661"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G1203"\w*, \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \add art\add* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* hast \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1722"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* of \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w servant|strong="G3816"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* hast \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Why|strong="G2444"\w* \w did|strong="G5433"\w* the \w heathen|strong="G1484"\w* \w rage|strong="G5433"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w imagine|strong="G3191"\w* vain \w things|strong="G2756"\w*?

The \w kings|strong="G0935"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* stood \w up|strong="G3936"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w* were \w gathered|strong="G4863"\w* \w together|strong="G1909"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* of a \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w against|strong="G1909"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w child|strong="G3816"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast \w anointed|strong="G5548"\w*, \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pontius|strong="G4194"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*, were \w gathered|strong="G4863"\w* \w together|strong="G1909"\w*,

For to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="G3745"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w counsel|strong="G1012"\w* determined \w before|strong="G4309"\w* to be \w done|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w behold|strong="G1896"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w threatenings|strong="G0547"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w grant|strong="G1325"\w* \w unto|strong="G1401"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w*, that \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w boldness|strong="G3954"\w* they may \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*,

\w By|strong="G1722"\w* stretching \w forth|strong="G1614"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w heal|strong="G2392"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w* may be \w done|strong="G1096"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G3816"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w child|strong="G3816"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1189"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* had \w prayed|strong="G1189"\w*, the \w place|strong="G5117"\w* was \w shaken|strong="G4531"\w* \w where|strong="G3739"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* assembled \w together|strong="G4863"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w were|strong="G4130"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* with \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w boldness|strong="G3954"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* of \w them|strong="G4100"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w of|strong="G2588"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G5590"\w* \w one|strong="G2532"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w*: \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \add of them\add* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* ought of the things which he \w possessed|strong="G5224"\w* \w was|strong="G1511"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G2258"\w* all \w things|strong="G0537"\w* \w common|strong="G2839"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1411"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w gave|strong="G0591"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w witness|strong="G3142"\w* of the \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*: \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="G3761"\w* was \w there|strong="G5225"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G5225"\w* \w lacked|strong="G1729"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w were|strong="G5225"\w* \w possessors|strong="G2935"\w* of \w lands|strong="G5564"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w houses|strong="G3614"\w* sold \w them|strong="G4453"\w*, and \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* the \w prices|strong="G5092"\w* of the things that were \w sold|strong="G4097"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \add them\add* \w down|strong="G5087"\w* \w at|strong="G3844"\w* the \w apostles’|strong="G0652"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* distribution was \w made|strong="G1239"\w* unto every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* according \w as|strong="G2530"\w* \w he|strong="G5100"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Joses|strong="G2500"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* was \w surnamed|strong="G1941"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w*, (\w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, being \w interpreted|strong="G3177"\w*, The \w son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w consolation|strong="G3874"\w*,) a \w Levite|strong="G3019"\w*, \add and\add* of the country \w of|strong="G1085"\w* \w Cyprus|strong="G2953"\w*,

\w Having|strong="G5225"\w* \w land|strong="G0068"\w*, \w sold|strong="G4453"\w* \add it\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* the \w money|strong="G5536"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \add it\add* \w at|strong="G3844"\w* the \w apostles’|strong="G0652"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*.
